outputs.output_descr: Facility created to fund costs associated with the review, updating, re-formulation and appraisal of the three agriculture project documents: "Strengthening of Food and Agriculture Information System", "Reduction of Post Harvest Losses for Food  Security", "Improved Seed Production for Sustainable Agriculture". Also used for formulation of the "Integrated Crop and Livestock" concept note.

project_descr: Project Initiation Plan for formulation of 3 agriculture projects; also used for formulation of the Integrated Crop and Livestock concept note.
